item.title: Player help
item.dc:creator: @i_dupe_alote i dupe alote
item.description:
@i_dupe_alote wrote:

I want to add a new character thing to my characters, but when I do, and put all this where it is supposed to be, ALL OF THE CHARACTERS THAT HAD STUFF TURNS INTO 0 KB! It deletes all of what they did, how can I add this and stop it from happening? Please help me.

I compile and get this also, that is in the server runner.

I put all of this in my Player.exe:
} else if (token.equals(“maxCash”)) {
p.maxCash = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and:

					characterfile.write("maxCash = ", 0, 12);
		characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.maxCash), 0, Integer.toString(p.maxCash).length());
		characterfile.newLine();

Where they are supposed to be.

In player.java i put this:

public int maxCash = 0;

I am trying to do that for this command:

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("depo")) {
		if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 2000000000)) {
		c.sendMessage("You need 2B to deposite it to your infinite bank.");
		return;
		} 
		c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 2000000000);
		c.sendMessage("You have deposited 2B to a infinite bank.");
		c.maxCash += 1;
		}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("undepo")) {
		c.maxCash = 0;
		c.sendMessage("You do not have 2B or more in your infinite bank.");
		return;
		c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000000000);
		c.sendMessage("You have took 2B from your infinite bank.");
		c.maxCash -= 1;
		}

WHAT AM I DOING WRONG?

Read full topic
